title: *Attempting to reconnect to chat*
body: So my buddy and I have been playing 3-5 games without problems, when suddenly he got this "Attempting to reconnect to chat" thingy. This renders him unable to invite / chat. He tried searching the problems up, we've been trying for a solid hours. We have tried stuff like deleting a certain folder/file | Reinstalling | clean reinstall | force patch | changing the date 1 day back and forth.... Etc etc... So if anyone knows a solution or a possible fix pls tell :p{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: This is so strange!  There seems to be some issues right now where some players on EUW aren't able to login at all.  Meanwhile, it seems that some others can get int but unable to reach pvp.net.  In this case, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to gather some logs, and send it over to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a look into this, so we can figure out what the hell is going on today.  :p  See you there!
I have done it now :) Hope it will be fixed soon
